mapper.insert: insert into big_tree_reply(rno ,bno, reply, replyer) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{bno},#{reply},#{replyer})
mapper.update: update big_tree_reply set reply= #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno,bno,reply,replyer,replyDate,updateDate form big_tree_reply where bno =#{bno} order by rno asc
